reviewText: The product does the job and has worked fine since the first day.  I would recommend this charger as it also works for my Galaxy S4.
This is another great product that has helped keep my phone charged in my truckthis was a great product and deserves 100 percent.
does not work most of the time. when it works, charging is very very slow.who should i contact to get a replacement or my money back. pl advise.thank you.
Good lengthEasy to useVery fast chargingI would recommend it to persons who use their phone a lot.
luving it  right now will last about 4 mo so you cant beat the price for it I got 4 of them
great price/ works very well. Is a little bulky, but does the job of charging the cell phone. good buy.
excellent unit and compact to keep phone charged on trips. keep in car for those times when on trips.great little unit very compact

First one I got died after a few charges. Thought I'd give them a second chance and get another one. This one does not charge at all, it actually drains the phone battery even quicker when plugged in. No, I would not buy again. Can't believe Samsung put their name on it.

I purchased this car charger "Samsung Official OEM Car Charger for your Galaxy S2 Phone! Original Equipment and Manufacturer (DC 12 volt)" thinking I was getting the real deal. This is not Samsung quality. The connector fits loosely and stops charging without you noticing. The build quality and materials are very cheap. It's so bad there's a big gap where the cable meets the main body of the charger, so big the cable fastener pries loose. I'll post a picture.
summary: Fake, it's not a real Samsung product, bad quality

reviewText: O.K. If you have money to throw away, then shop Sprint.com and spend $30 dollars. This charger is less than $6 bucks and it works great.  It is a quality prodcut and who would have though I'd save so much money.  Whatever floats your boat, but I'll take the money train.$$$$$$
finally one that works.  I've wasted more money than saved for cheap knockoffs.  This charger actually works for me and my Samsung.

JUNK!!!......This product must be miss labeled.  I can not get my Samsung S2 phone to charge with this OEM charger.  The lights are on, the phone says its charging but nothing happens.  I am not sure if I got a defective product but it is very upsetting to sit in your car for hours and not see your phone recharge.  If you need a reliable charger, DO NOT purchase this product.If you need a car charger for your Samsung S2, I would recommend the Motorola Vehicle Power Adapter.  It charges fast and is dependable.
The cord is a little shorter than I expected, but overall, I'm, satisfied with this product! I have refered this item to my friends!

I used this charger for three months with no problems. After the 2nd month, it started going in and out. I had to wedge my phone against something so the charger was being pressed down on for it to charge. After the 3rd month... it stopped completely. I've confirmed it's not just my phone by having friends try and not just my car by trying it in my truck as well.
BOUGHT THIS CHARGER FOR A TRIP.....HALF WAY TO MY DESTINATION I HAD TO STOP AND BUY A NEW ONE !!IT DID NOT WORK ....USELESS !
summary: USELESS  NOT WORTH THE COST TO SEND IT BACK

reviewText: Received this item very quickly and better than advertised.  Had a car charger that died.  this one when you plug it into the socket, does not actually start charging/turn on units charging light until plugged into phone.  Most units I see that are plugged into the socket are always burning red on when not plugged into the phone which I believe why they burn out prematurely.

I actually ordered this for my friend, she knows I'm an amazon shopper, so I ordered it for her because she needed it for the car when she went to the beach, while she was able to entertain her son during the ride to the beach.
would buy another one again. I don't  know why anyone would buy one anywhere else. for the price you cant beat it
Ordered October 3,2012Well it is hard to write a review on something you have not received.Seems to be taking a long time to arrive.Will update if it arrives.
I like this charger. It's great for traveling. Also, when your phone is low on charge and you're in traffic, it comes in handy. Thank you
I only used it for a couple of times to charge my phone, it seems charging fine. I like the green charge light comes on only if the car is on.
This did not work in the car will never order anything from here again. Complete waste of money. Not worth getting if your trying to save a couple of dollars.
A very good car charger for your phones, charged my phone pretty quickly and quite affordable, I recommend it to anyone to have as a back up to your charger.

They charge my phone faster then the wall outlet which I find weird and the little light is nice and easy.  The only issue is I've bought three of them and they tend to just fall apart at the fuse if you pull out of the charge area.
Works great. Product is exactly as stated. Fits better than the one my son paid over 3x the money from his phone company store.
It's great.  Exactly what I wanted and it's from Samsung.  I can charge my phone when it's battery is going down - after work or from place to place on the weekend.  Great buy for the price.

reviewText: This item broke after only one week.  We were very disappointed as we relied on it while out of state for a weekend.

Excellent product! This is by far the best car charger that I've had for this phone! Love it! Love it!
it work as well as expected as far as car chargers go its a very good quality i would recommend

reviewText: WHAT A GREAT PRICE!RIGHT OUT OF THE BOX, PLUG N UPLOAD SUM JUICE ...DON'T KNOW IF DROPPING IT REPEATEDLY ON THE FLOORBOARD,OR OCCASIONALLY STUFFING IT IN CONSOLE TO HIDE CAUSED FAILURE ...BUT SOON THE GREEN LIGHT FAILED TO LIGHT, AND PHONES DISPLAY SHOWEDIT WASN'T CHARGING. SO EITHER SPEND SEVERAL MORE DOLLARS FOR ONE WITHA HEAVIER CORD/STRONGER SHELL OR TREAT IT AS A DELICATE FLOWER.
This item worked very well in my car! Phone received a quick charge between point A and point B. I would recommend this item to friends and family.

Just received this a couple of days ago and have only used it once.  It seems to charge okay, but the length is the problem.  It has that spirral retracting cord, and if one  was to extend it as far as possible. it MIGHT be 6.5 feet long.  However, one could never use it that way because the thing pulls back into the coiled position that is not more than maybe two feet.  This makes it almost impossible to plug into your socket and do anything other than place the phone on your seat. While driving, the phone very easily slides off the seat and onto the floor when you make even an easy right turn.  Frustrating.  The main reason I bought this was because of the advertised length. I knew upfront from looking at the picture that it was probably all of not truly 6.5 feet, but this is ridiculous.  So, don't believe the thing is really longer than 2 feet, if that.Update, 3/8/13: After using this thing for a couple of days in my car, I find that the comments made by other reviewers about the defective connection of the charger cord to the phone is something that is occurring with mine as well. I find that I have to disconnect this thing several times before it actually makes a hot connection. So, this problem combined with my initial complaint about the lack of useable cord length, would rate a no-star grade.  DON'T but thing thing. I paid $8.33 for this and it is worth nothing to me now.

I was skeptical after having bought a few other car chargers that didn't last (one didn't make it a month), that I had low hopes for this inexpensive charger.  I was happily surprised.  I have been using this charger for many months and have not had a single issue.  I'd recommend this charger to family and friends

I plugged it into the cigarette lighter and the green light came on but it didn't charge my phone. Since it is only possible to plug in the mini-usb one way that was not the issue. It's a car charger for my Samsung Galaxy 2.  It works just fine, the way it's supposed to.  Haven't had any problem with it.

does not stay plugged in to well in my car. have to keep moving it around and around. falls out.

it is fair good, i dont like much the cable that it does not look too strong but it works just fine

better than the one i got with the cel phone. can keep it in the car and its there when i need it.

reviewText: Works perfectly with my Samsung Galaxy.  I like that the power light comes on only when the phone is connected and charging.  No dead battery when you thought you had it plugged in.  Also like the asymmetrical end that plugs into phone.  No fiddling around to see if the usb plug is upside down.  Little things, that make a difference.  Plus, it's inexpensive.
summary: Samsung Galaxy?... this is your charger!

reviewText: OEM for my Galaxy S2 for less than $10? Well don't mind if I do. Definitely recommend. At the mall you would spend no less than $20 for the same item
Hey for the wait it was worth the price. If you don't mind the shipping time the price is so right. I was very happy with this purchase

It takes much longer than my normal charger for it to charge my phone. Also makes a very weird screeching noise when its plugged into my phone but that could just be me. It does work though, but works very slowly to charge your phone.
Bought two different Samsung OEM chargers.  This one had issues almost immediately with establishing a connection and keeping it.  Other one working just fine.  Will replace with other type.

The pin needed to make the connection within the cigarette lighter was so deeply recessed, and off-center, that it never made a connection. I reported it to Amazon and returned it via UPS as directed, but have not received a refund.
Stopped working after 1week.  The car charger no longer charges my phone after only one week.I would not recommend ordering
Plugged into the car and worked the first couple of days. Hasn't worked since. My phone does not even recognize it's plugged in.

Great price for genuine OEM product. Works great and as another review noted, the charger does not power up until you plug it into your phone. Wish the cable was a bit longer so that I can place my phone further away from the outlet, but this will vary with the user's cars.
This works well in my car. I didn't have any problems with it at all. Great for traveling and on the move.

I always research all purchases before I buy them - I try to locate consistent flaws by multiple reviews and compare products to other similar products when possible. This item has wonderful reviews by significant comparison to other chargers that work for my Galaxy S II (Epic 4G Touch from Spring). The unit very strong and I believe it will hold up well. The only issue I have with it is that my car - 2007 Pontiac G6 - makes the curly cord difficult to maneuver to ensure a connection without tugging on both ends. I cannot attach it to any surface but the window because of the surface of my dashboard, which makes it a little awkward because there isn't enough straight cord to make it less taut. However, it is great quality.

reviewText: it takes tooooo long to charge your phone.  you better buy something else.  I am not using it any more.

reviewText: it works perfect the only problem is that I wish it had a longer cord. Its well worth the price.

It came on time and is OEM product so no issues here.

I have purchased 5 of these now from 3 different suppliers.  They all work and the price was DEFINITELY right.  (Samsung wants about 3-4 times as much for theirs.)  However, if you think these are actually OEM at a quarter of the price that Samsung sells them for, think that through very carefully.  3 of the 5 have the same serial number.  If they were actually Samsung produced / approved perhaps they should each have a different serial number?....I do not know, maybe the serial number is actually a batch or manufacturing facility number on an accessory type product as opposed to an actual individual item differentiating number.  So just a heads up, check the available warranty.

Like the title says, it's meeting all my expectations so far. I'll update the review if things change. Some of the reviews I read before purchasing were not so glowing. But I've experienced nothing to make me regret buying it as of now. It charges my Galaxy S2 i9100 just fine.

reviewText: It fits, it works.  Glad to find an OEM. Again I have nothing more to say to fill the required words.

Use it whenever I'm driving.  Keeps phone fully charged.  This is something everyone should have.  Now my phone is always at 100%.

reviewText: Plugged it in and it worked for one charge. The second time I plugged it in it quit working.  I guess you get what you pay for!! Now it looks like it will take several weeks to get my money back. I am really disappointed with Amazon and the return policy.

Ordered 2 to charge my S2 in both vehicles; however neither appear to be able to put a charge into my phone. Both units light up, both display the phone is 'charging' yet the battery continues to drain. Tested both units out on multiple lighter outlets on 3 different vehicles with the same effect. Whether or not the exact model of S2 is to blame (though I would have a difficult time believing the batteries are different amongst them), I was very disappointed I could not get these items to work. Even worse; by the time I picked them up from my post box I had run out of time to return them within the timeframe, though that is clearly not the seller's fault. Overall a disappointment.

This charger doesn't work at all...I have the same charger that I bought a long while back (from another seller probably) and it works fine but this one looks the same but doesn't charge a thing! I need to return this junk...

I damaged a battery and my phone messing around with bogus chargers. Glad to have a Samsung and not lose an arm or leg.

reviewText: This charger works great. I love the fact that the LED on it does not light up until it is plugged into the phone. Great bargain.

The car charger that I ordered with my phone did not work well from the start. All the stars had to be aligned in order for the phone to charge. This one has worked perfectly every time. I no longer have to worry about losing phone service during long car trips.
This charger began smoking after I plugged it into the cigarette outlet. No wonder my phone started freaking out when I plugged it in. Lucky it didn't ruin my phone.
Does not want to charge my phone. I have a galaxy S 2. My old car charger works better and it is not even made for samsug.I would not buy this again.

This car charger was included with the 'set' I ordered.  I typically just use the standard travel charger in my car, but this is also nice to have.  Now, I can plug something else into the outlet. :)  Does what it should - when it should.

I spend a lot of time in my car so it's nice to have a charger in the car so I don't run out of juice when I'm out on the job.  The charger works fine (not a lot of power but it keeps my phone working) and the product was delivered quickly.
Works. Good price.  I like the shape which is more convenient than ones that do not bend down.  Less chance of getting knocked accidentally.

I spent the extra money to get the official Samsung car charger and it stopped working after two months.  The good news is it charges a LOT faster than the cheap Chinese imitation car chargers, the bad news is unless I push cord near the charger to a near 90 degree angle, it doesn't charge the phone.  This makes driving kind of dangerous if I have both hands on the charger.  I'd try your luck with an imitation.

Plugs in - light comes on - phone shows charging.  Never gains battery percentages.  I would not recommend this charger to anyone seeking a device to charge their Galaxy S3.  In this case - I got what I paid for.
THIS IS A FALSIFICATION !! IS NOT ORIGINAL PRODUCT..  ITS HORRIBLE..DONT LIKE.. DONT BUY... THEY LIE WITH THIS PRODUCT.. GIVE ME MY MONEY BACK !!

The charger works well, and doesn't have a light on if the phone isn't charging so it doesn't drain your car battery. It is Samsung OEM product, so you know it will work fine with your Samsung phone, and saves a ton of money over buying a carrier branded one. Glad I got it!

Good high quality official Samsung charger. A premium product without the premium price. Don't go to a big box store and pay for a non-OEM charger that will likely be broken in a few weeks when you can order one from here for 60-75% less that charges your phone the right way.
Received what they show on the image. The charger is great, my cellphones loves it, I love it too.I feel safe because now I know that I'm using something that is compatible with my cellphone.
It's working with my samsung galaxy SII. It was not so expensive. I am using it for almost half year without problems.
nice to have one.nothing so special about it just an ordinary charging cable with samsung engraving .but need to have a car charger in case of emergency.
Shipped quicker then expected, works great. I guess if i had a complaint i wish the cord would be a bit longer, but I've wished that about every car charger i've ever had. this one is standard size.

reviewText: Bought two chargers. One for GS2 Skyrocket, one for GS3. Both chargers lit up and said charging. Neither one worked. Cheap knock-off of Samsung charger. Spend extra money to get a quality product.
works well still after 2 months. The phone charges really quickly too. Cable is a little bit short but other than that I couldn't have asked for much more from the charger.

reviewText: It did exactly what I needed it for. It was cheaper than going to the store to get it and I've had no problems out of it, thanks!

reviewText: From what I remember when I bought this charger many months ago. I was having trouble deciding which one to get, so many choices and so many people complaining that certain ones were just not working as described or even caused their phones to act up. Well I got this simple Samsung Charger for my Samsung Galaxy S2 Skyrocket, really don't think it matters which phone you have as long as you have a mini-usb port. Well it worked great, and its been doing its job since I purchased it. It's small, its sleek, no crazy lights other than one mini LED to tell you if its charging or not. If this sounds like something you want, it's exactly what you'll get.

The cord does not fit the Galaxy S2 securely. You have to lay it at an angle for it to catch charge. Also it really doesn't charge. It just gives juice to your phone. Had it charged on a trip for a good hour and when I unplugged it I was at a lower percentage then when I first charged it.Ended up throwing it away.

This is virtually useless.  If the phone is doing anything (even just idling on), the output of this charger is not enough to keep my S2 from draining.  Doing anything more than that, and the charging barely lowers the rate of depletion.
Fell apart after a few uses. Still finding pieces in the car. Pay a little more for a much better product.
El producto es tal y como se lo describió, hasta el momento funciona correctamente y se ve que es de buena calidad.

reviewText: This car charger was priced great and works perfect with my phone.  I have the Sprint Samsung Galaxy S2. Would purchase again if needed.

Worked perfect for my Galaxy S2.  Haven't had any problems with it.  It gets the job done.  Would definitely recommend.
Well the charger was exactly what the description says it would be. Works fine, no problems here. It gets five stars.
excellent charger with long cord. samsung brand so you know its good quality. a a a a a a a

However, after an hour driving and leave it there, it doesn't seems to be charged at all. In fact, it didn't do anything, the battery power goes down as usual. Not what I was hoping but probably it is just my car or the phone.
It didn't work. Another one was sent and it didn't work either.My account was credited and I had no problem.
Purchased this charger for my upgraded BB bold which takes a different charger than my older version. Price was affordable. Recommend.
The old one stopped working so I had to buy another one. I saw no issues with charger.  works just like advertised.  would highly recommend and would purchase again.

Ordered 3 of these chargers and none of them worked with either of our Blackberry 9900's model's.  Connection was lose and did not charge the BB's.Seller agreed to return but has not refunded shipping costs.  Also had to pay for the return shipping costs.  Now out of pocket RT shipping costs.  Don't waste your money.
I gave them 5 stars. Quick confirmation and very fast delivery time. Product was exactly as described. Charger fit my phone perfectly and works very well. Very good job. Thanks.
The cell phone charger was delivered quickly and was exactly as described.  A perfect replacment for the one I lost. Had a positive experience with seller.  Would buy from them again.

I reviewed an earlier item the same way. They both are terrible. OEM  I doubt it. The price should have been the red flag. So here we go on this one.  This was advertised as appropriate for my Phone. It never worked. I could charge it all day long. The price was great and the unit was JUNK. Spend the money and don't get a make believe brand. If it is too good to be true it is NOT! Spend the extra dollars and get a quality charger. I did and it made all the difference in the world. This product works best in the warehouse unopened.
I got a second charger for my office, that way I am never on "down time" with my cell phone.
summary: this one is for my office

reviewText: I like having several chargersin various places. This itemhad a low price, has workedas advertised and has beenreliable.
This item is an excellent product, looks and works like the original charger.

I ordered and received the OEM LG charger within 3 business days. Product  is exactly as describbed and works fine. Great vendor. Highly recommended
I have no recollection of ever purchasing this product so I am unable to rate it one way or another.
This charger works much better than non OEM charger. After using this one, I will never buy any non OEM charger again.
The LG420g phone car charger works well and was just what I was looking for. Arrived quickly. I highly recommend the product.
I ordered this after misplacing my original power supply while on vacation. The price is great, the item was delivered on time and it's exactly what I needed.
One of two units didn't work but the company made it good immediately, quickly sending a new one to replace the one that was inoperable. I would order from this company again.

The first one I got worked well for about a week and then mysteriously quit. The distributor immediately sent a replacement which does the job. I especially like the long cord. You can never have too many chargers!

I ordered two chargers for my Motorola droid x. One worked fine but the other did not work. I contacted the seller about this. The seller sent me a replacement within no time and at no cost. This one worked fine. The good thing about these chargers is the extra long cord which helps. The original charger that comes with droid x has a really short cord possibly only two feet so you cannot put it on a bed side table while connected to an outlet. You can do it with this charger. I believe it also takes less time to fully charge the phone.

One of the two ordered was defective. The seller immediately shipped a replacement but shipped the miniUSB type in error. Still waiting for a replacement with the correct item. The detacheable type has too short a cord where this model has a longer cord and works great with the DroidX multi-media station or simply as a wall charger.
summary: Much better than the detachable cord model

reviewText: Bought 2 of these 6 months ago or so, 1 died within the first couple weeks but the other still works for the most part. Can't beat it for the price.
Outstanding product at an excellent price - In today's economy any savings is money in your pocket to offset the rising cost of living.  Very pleased with the purchase and with Amazon.

This is NOT the charger that is pictured here. I have the Motorola DroidX and i wanted a charger that was longer than the one i have because it is barely 3 ft and won't even reach my bedside table. i bought this one because it was a fixed wire into the plug and longer. but the charger that i actually bought and received was basically the same exact charger that came with my phone. The charger works okay, but just be aware that it is not what is shown.
summary: works but not the charger shown.

reviewText: This charger is awesome! No more having to deal with the 3ft original charger, this one is roughly 6.5 ft long. It also charges the phone very quickly compared to the original charger. Definitely worth the money!

I purchased this charger about a week ago, because my old one was beginning to wear out and work improperly. The charger arrived today, ahead of schedule; however, when I plugged it in to a wall outlet and my phone, it had no effect. I tried several different outlets, but none worked. This charger is COMPLETELY USELESS. DO NOT BUY IT. YOU WILL BE DISAPPOINTED.I would suggest going with the non-"rapid rate" charger. It seems to work just fine.Good luck!
great cord very long but the base of it kept coming apart when you take it out of the wall after charging. I taped it together and it worked a total of about a year.

The only difference I have noticed with this charger is that the cord is maybe just a little less pliable than the charger that came with my phone.  I can't seem to get the cord to straighten out completely, but that is just cosmetic.  It functions perfectly.  Have used it plugged into my charging base as well as directly into the phone.  Would buy again.
summary: Works as well as the original that came with my phone

reviewText: I guess I got what I paid for, at $2.49. It (the phone charger) arrived undamaged, but it does not work at all. I tried many different electrical outlets. Still, nothing. I'd give the product NO stars if that were an option. I was deluding myself, thinking that cheaper was just as good. However, a phone charger that's not functioning is worthless.
I needed a charger that would allow me to continue working while charging.  This works perfectly.  No problems at all. The cord is long, thin and flexible so it doesn't get in my way.

This charger is not the same as what you get in the original packaging. It's not a separate charger/usb cable but it does the job its meant to do and is twice as long as the stock charger that comes with the droid x.
summary: Good charger, long cord, no usb

reviewText: 1. I emailed supplier asking if this rapid charger has same "intelligent"chip as basic charger, allowing you to stay plugged in without risking overcharging battery. No response.  POvercharging will reduce battery life.2. While plugged in, display is less sensitive, somewhat erratic, so I recharge, then unplug as needed. It's a bit inconvenient, & concerns me.If anyone has information on this, please post a review.
summary: Works well, except for one concern.

reviewText: Product does not work on the Verizon Droid X. Was disappointed that the product did fit my phone, just would not charge it.

If you need a charger and are tired of everyone "borrowing" yours to plug into the usb in the car or thier computer this is it! No usb involved. Regular wall charger. Simple packaging to save everyone money and the environment. Shipped faster than expected. Does exactly what I need it to for a great price!
Looked like a great deal, but looks can be deceiving.  After charging my phone twice it is now completely useless.

Not only do the LOOK a LOT different than my 3 original ACTUAL MOTOROLA rapid chargers, but they DON'T WORK - I now believe from my experiences that they are CHINESE KNOCK-OFFS not OEM.  The plugs that go into the phone aren't even right.  One of the charger works now that I modified the plug on my phone.  EVERYTHING about these smacks of countfeit/fakes.

reviewText: This longer cord works so much better for me then what came with the phone.  I didn't want to charge my phone by plugging it into the computer and didn't have a space real close to an electrical outlet that I wanted to keep my phone.  Using this I can charge the phone on my nightstand next to the bed.  Also a really great bargain.

It only charges some times.  Most of the time it does absolutely nothing or it just restarts my phone.  Buy anything else.  Go to the bar and buy one beer.  It will go to better use than this charger.

I had a working charger for my Droid X but I wanted one with a longer cord. I found this product, which also was a rapid charger, and the price was excellent. I received the product within just a few days of my order and it works just as promised. Great product at a great price!
This charger works great with my DroidX, the cord is quite long which is a definite plus for me, the original charger cord is very short which was very irritating to me.
great charger  works perfectly, product made well and made to last. if you need a charger for your driod x  this is the one to get

I told my son that I was not buying another home phone charger for this stupid phone I hate anyway.  Verizon charges a ridiculous amount of money...he said buy it on the internet.  OMG  It is perfect and works great and only cost $5 .
Just as described. OEM as stated and worth with I paid for it. I would highly recommend this item to anyone who needs a wall charger

Charger worked just fine for a few times... We were very pleased at first and it sure came in handy on vacation last year. However the cord plug that plugs into the car lighter unit has a broken connection now so it's pretty much useless. It should be noted that we took good care of it like we do all electronic devices.
